name: Game Fixer Kit 2020
description:
What starts out as seemingly a normal platformer takes a turn for the weird when a demon suddenly appears to chow down on your controller (Or keyboard if you're into that)! 

Keys destroyed by the demon will no longer function, but there is a way! If one wishes to use their functions, they need only drag the exposed wires to other keys!

KEYBOARD and GAMEPAD support included. MOUSE required.

CREDITS

Linus "Traggey" Asplund - Art, Sound, Level Design, Game Design.
Yun-Shuo "Kreekakon" Cheng - Programming, Game Design, prettiest boy
Bendik Nyhus - 3D Art, Sound

Additional Level Design By.
Lachlan Crespin
Ben O'Donnell

Freesound.org - Sound Resource

Pookatori and Friends" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
